title.native: 乙女ゲームの破滅フラグしかない悪役令嬢に転生してしまった…
title.romaji: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta…
title.english: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!

description:
Wealthy heiress Katarina Claes is hit in the head with a rock and recovers the memories of her past life. It turns out the world she lives in is the world of the game Fortune Lover, an otome game she was obsessed with in her past life... but she's been cast as the villain character who tries to foil the protagonist's romances! The best ending the game has for Katarina is exile, and the worst, death! She'll have to find a way to avoid triggering the flags of doom, and make her own happy future!

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)
synonyms: I Reincarnated into an Otome Game as a Villainess With Only Destruction Flags..
转生成为了只有乙女游戏破灭Flag的邪恶大小姐…
เกิดใหม่เป็นนางร้ายจะเลือกทางไหนก็หายนะ

tags.name: Mixed Gender Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several people, regardless of gender, who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Horticulture
tags.description: The story prominently features plant care and gardening.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Agriculture
tags.description: Prominently features agriculture practices.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

node.description: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hidakanami)
[Syosetu](https://mypage.syosetu.com/345617/)

Affiliated with Studio Live. Admires [Kazuko Tadano](https://anilist.co/staff/118426/).

Her designs are very shoujo manga like, often featuring glittering eyes.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/inobow00)
angela is a Japanese pop band. The main members are Yamashita Atsuko (artist name "atsuko") and Hirasato Katsunori (artist name "KATSU").

__[Official Website](http://www.shouta-aoi.jp/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/noboru0811) | [Personal Twitter](https://twitter.com/shouta0811aoi) | [Professional Twitter](https://twitter.com/AOISHOUTAstaff) | [Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/aoishoutaKING)__

Singer and voice actor since February 2011. Used to have a complex about his feminine voice, but he got over it because people liked that type of unique voice.

Ryuunosuke Matsushita in _Kimi to Boku_ was his first anime role. He also sings many insert songs in the same anime. Ai Mikaze from _UtaPri_ series is the role that made him popular. Debuted with the mini-album "Blue Bird" on June 26, 2013.
Affiliated with [SILVER LINK](https://anilist.co/studio/300/SILVER-LINK).
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/亀山俊樹)
[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/natsumi-tabuchi)

**Education:** Kunitachi College of Music

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/hanae-nakamura)

Hanae Nakamura is a music composer.

**Alma Mater:** Liverpool Institute for Performing Arts (BA Music)

[Website](https://tatsumusic.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tatsu_saiki) | [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/tatsuyan)

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/miki-sakurai)

Miki Sakurai was born in 1991 in Miyagi Prefecture. Graduated from Tokyo University of the Arts. She studied composition with Tatsuhiko Nishioka, Yoshihiko Katori, and electronic acoustic music with Takenobu Mori. While studying at university, she began to play Irish music and produce music for art animation. Currently active in various fields, including theater.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/629551696)

Affiliated with EXPLOSION.

Has a twin brother named [Naoki Etou](https://anilist.co/staff/146123) in the animation industry.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/shukanematsu) | [Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/shu-kanematsu)
Date of Birth: June 12, 1974 Birthplace: Okayama Prefecture __Katsunori Hirasato__ is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist, guitarist, bass drummer, sanshin, DJ and member of pop band angela.
Date of Birth: June 12, 1974 Birthplace: Okayama Prefecture __Katsunori Hirasato__ is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist, guitarist, bass drummer, sanshin, DJ and member of pop band angela.

Date of Birth: January 23, 1975 Height: 150cm Birthplace: Okayama Prefecture Interest: Travel, Automobiles Likes: Rice Dislikes: Cigarettes __Atsuko Yamashita__ is a Japanese vocalist, composer, lyricist and member of the pop band angela.

Date of Birth: January 23, 1975 Height: 150cm Birthplace: Okayama Prefecture Interest: Travel, Automobiles Likes: Rice Dislikes: Cigarettes __Atsuko Yamashita__ is a Japanese vocalist, composer, lyricist and member of the pop band angela.

__[Profile (Victor Entertainment)](https://www.jvcmusic.co.jp/-/Profile/A018532.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/julishono)__

__Birthplace:__ Takatsuki City, Osaka Prefecture, Japan
__Favorite Artists:__ Carole King, Stevie Wonder, Joni Mitchell, Aretha Franklin, Erykah Badu, SADE, India Arie, Macy Gray, JOYCE

__Juli Shouno__ is a Japanese lyricist.
__DJ First__ is a Japanese DJ, composer and arranger.
